description:
Country: Regional Sales Director, Higher Education

US West Northeast South

The Talent Search Group at Partner in Publishing is working with the world-leader in scientific research and education video resources for libraries and Higher Education. We are seeking Regional Sales Directors to expand market share at Higher Education institutions within the assigned regions.

Roles are located in the following territories:

West US

South US

NorthEast US

Key Responsibilities:
• Identify opportunities and manage the entire sales cycle, from initial contact to contract negotiation and closure
• Establish strong relationships with key stakeholders, understand their specific challenges and objectives and demonstrate how your solution can address their unique needs
• Meet or exceed quarterly and annual sales targets and quotas
• Provide valuable market feedback to the product development team to help enhance the product based on customer needs

Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree. Master’s degree is a plus
• Proven track record of success in B2B sales, preferably in Higher Ed Tech
• Strong understanding of the Higher Ed landscape

Compensation:
• Competitive base salary
• Uncapped Commission structure
• Benefits package
• Expense reimbursement for travel

Job Category: Sales

Market: Higher Education

Location: Remote

Type: External
